DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study determine whether biological stress marker ( Oxidized Phosphatidylcholines ) blood use predict efficacy rTMS treatment major depressive disorder ( MDD ) . It goal identify biomarkers may use determine patient benefit rTMS treatment . A second objective study measure change stress marker occur across course rTMS therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Biological Markers Treatment Response Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Depression
DOC.detailed_description: 30 patient prescribed repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) therapy treatment major depressive disorder recruit study . Prior undergoing rTMS , patient give small blood sample . An additional blood sample give upon completion rTMS treatment . 30 healthy control individual also recruit provide one-time blood sample comparison . Control individual receive rTMS treatment . Blood sample analyse level Oxidized Phosphatidylcholines . The investigator wish determine whether difference pre-treatment level stress marker individual ultimately respond rTMS . Additionally , investigator wish determine whether change stress marker result rTMS treatment .
